The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
NineLivesBladeWorks Mod by elysees

NineLivesBladeWorks
-Auto learn
-Alteraion
-6sec Casting Time

::NineLivesBladeWorks::
>How to Use? :
Bound Berserk Sword > isSprinting !!!
Damage : 30+(Alteration+Twohanded)/2 <- 9HIT
(Only! One time!)

::Console Command::
`> Set nineDamageRate to 1.0
default value 1.0 (1.0=100%)



::Berserk AxeSword (none Ench version)::
Smithing > Daedric Tab




::CREDIT::
Berserk Sword : Skeleton K
